explains: n. 树丛，小树林；果树林，果园；（用于街道名）街，路（Grove）

sentences.en: I might as well recommend you to go to the "Grove".
It's how we can get our grove back or find our mojo.
sentences.cn: 这就是如何找回我们的小树林或找到我们的魔力的办法。

sentences.en: When I finished the minimill story, Grove said, "OK, I get it."
sentences.cn: 当我结束小钢铁厂的故事时，格罗夫说：“好，我明白了。”
